casebody.data:
TRUSTEES OF the WASHINGTON WEST CONDOMINIUM
v.
Hisham ASHKOURI. 18-P-134 Appeals Court of Massachusetts. Entered: May 1, 2019

So much of the corrected judgment after rescript as allowed recovery against Ashkouri personally for the payment of condominium fees, late charges, interest, and costs of collection, is vacated. The remainder of the corrected judgment after rescript is affirmed.
